meanings: strangeness, queerness, peculiarity, oddity, curiousness, grotesqueness, 괴상하다 (be) strange, queer, peculiar, odd, grotesque
strange, weird, odd, bizarre, peculiar, (충격적인) outrageous

vlive.korean: 괴상한 사진 찍는 걸 좋아하잖아요. You like taking crazy looking photos. 듣기 View video stellar : 효율 가로방송👀
